application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Conditions 5 (Arboricultural Report) and (Fire Safety Strategy Report) of planning permission 22/00672/HOU (Erection of single-storey rear and front extensions, enclosing front porch and associated changes to fenestration)
decision_conditions: The development shall be carried out in accordance with the submitted Tree Survey Report and Strategic Fire PlanReason: To safeguard trees worthy of retention and in the interests of the character and appearance of the area, in accordance with policy G7 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012, and In the interests of fire safety and to ensure the safety of all building users in accordance with Policy D12 (Fire safety) of the London Plan 2021. This is required prior to commencement as it goes to the heart of the scheme design
